item_stock.name: Chestplate of Stealth
item_stock.description: Despite being made of heavy metal, this chestplate is enchanted with a magic that completely masks the loud clanking that usually accompanies metal armor.

item_stock.name: Armor of Fire Resistance
item_stock.description: This set of armor is surprisingly cool to the touch; wearing this allows one to brave extremely hot conditions, such as volcanoes and to be impervious to flames.

item_stock.name: Helmet of Deflection
item_stock.description: This helmet comes with an enchantment that makes it harder for arrows and magic spells to hit you.

item_stock.name: Beginner's Tome
item_stock.description: Contains the basic must-know spells for any up-and-coming magic user such as Firebolt, Gust, Light, and everyone's favorite, Prestidigitation (includes a free pouch to hold your spell materials).

item_stock.name: Scroll of Scrying
item_stock.description: A one-use item that allows the user to see one target of their choice for up to 10 minutes (disclaimer: only works on creatures and objects).

item_stock.name: Bag of Holding
item_stock.description: A magical bag that can hold up to 500 pounds worth of items but still feel like only 15 pounds; simply think of the item you want to retrieve and it will appear in your hand when you reach into the bag (warning: flipping the bag inside out will cause all its contents to fall out).

item_stock.name: Potion of Invisibility
item_stock.description: Drinking this potion allows you and any belongings on you to become invisible for 1 hour.

item_stock.name: Elixir of Health
item_stock.description: One sip of this will cure all diseases, contains 10 sips.

item_stock.name: Fire Breathing Potion
item_stock.description: This potion allows the user to breath fire up to 15 feet away for 1 hour; we are not responsible for any damage caused by this potion.

item_stock.name: Dragon Scale Shield
item_stock.description: This shield is made from the hide of a white dragon and is quite good at preventing damage from ice magic and the white dragon's signature frost breath.

item_stock.name: Wand of Magic Missiles
item_stock.description: Allows the user to shoot up to 10 magical homing missiles per day.

item_stock.name: Wand of Wild Magic
item_stock.description: Every time it is used, it produces one of many magical effects, including summoning a flock of doves, changing your hair color, turning you into a potted plant, etc.; a great party item!

item_stock.name: Flaming Sword
item_stock.description: Each swing of this sword causes its edge to burst into flames, not for indoor use.

item_stock.name: Charm of Protection
item_stock.description: Forms a protective shell around the wearer for up to 3 hours a day, toggled on and off by a command word(instructions for setting up this command word will be included).

item_stock.name: Water Elemental Gem
item_stock.description: Shattering this gem allows one to summon a water elemental that will follow any orders for 8 hours before disappearing.

item_stock.name: Dagger of Returning
item_stock.description: This dagger will always return to its sheath after 15 seconds.

item_stock.name: Enchanting Hammer
item_stock.description: This hammer is used to apply enchantments to normal weapons either with scrolls or gems; simply insert the scroll or gem into the special slot in the handle and hammer away!

item_stock.name: Enlarging Axe
item_stock.description: This axe doubles in size when a command word is spoken; while this doubles range, remember that this will also double its weight!

item_stock.name: Flying Sword
item_stock.description: This floating sword is controlled with an enchanted glove, and can move as far as 60 feet away from the glove (instruction manual will be included).

item_stock.name: Bow of Entangling
item_stock.description: An arrow shot from this bow will turn into a coil of rope and wrap around the target upon impact.

item_stock.name: Sword of Pot Smashing
item_stock.description: One simple tap with this sword while completely obliterate any pot, regardless of size or material.

item_stock.name: Eye of True Sight
item_stock.description: Peering into this crystal allows one to see anything or anyone invisible.

item_stock.name: Helm of Night Vision
item_stock.description: While wearing this helm, one can see in the darkness as if it were daytime.

item_stock.name: Thundering Battleaxe
item_stock.description: Swinging this axe will cause a thunderwave that radiates out 15 feet from the wielder(note: we are not responsible for any hearing damage caused by this).

item_stock.name: Sending Stones
item_stock.description: A pair of stones enchanted to allow communication between them, no matter the distance.

item_stock.name: Wand of Polymorph
item_stock.description: Changes a creature into another of your choosing for up to one hour.
